fields.description:
I followed quick start guide from titanium site. 
Titanium throwing error when i clicks Appcelerator icon on Titanium toolbar
      
         " An exception occurred in the script. Error name: TypeError. Error description: Object doesn't support this property or method. Error number: -2146827850. Error message: Object doesn't support this property or method."

I already searched on web without any success. Some forum threads on the web  suggested me to install IE9 but on my WinXP2 SP3 it is not possible.

I am attaching error dialog's screenshot.
fields.summary: Throwing error when i clicks Appcelerator icon on Titanium toolbar
fields.environment:
Titanium Specs:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Build: jenkins-titanium-rcp-master-232 (origin/master)

Test Machine Specs:
Windows XP 2000 SP3 AMD AthlonX2

comments.body:
Hi Vishal,

Are you able to update to a later windows service pack, and update titanium studio/sdk to the latest version 3.0.2GA

Thanks

Thanks Jamie,

Just upgraded to Titanium Studio, build: 3.0.2.201302191606 and working well on my XP 2000 SP3 Acer machine.

Thanks again!
